document_data.name: Temple of Chauntea
document_data.mainbody: The '''Temple of Chauntea''' was a house of worship for [[Chauntea]] found in the capital city of [[Immilmar]] in [[Rashemen]] in the {{YearlinkName|1367}}.{{Cite interactive atlas}}
document_data.Location: The building was located in the southwest section of the city along the shore of [[Lake Ashane]].
document_data.Activities: Bhalla, as Chauntea was known in Rasheman, worship was closely monitored by the faithful within the temple to ensure that nothing strayed too far from official church doctrines, fearing that Rashemen's isolation could lead to a cult developing.
document_data.Inhabitants: The [[cleric]]s of the temple were supervised by [[Brother Shad]].
